statements: SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM vehicle_service_history
SELECT repair_date, repair_type, repair_description FROM vehicle_service_history
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_date, repair_date, repair_description FROM vehicle_service_history
SELECT maintenance_type, repair_type FROM vehicle_service_history
SELECT maintenance_date, repair_date, repair_type, repair_description FROM vehicle_service_history
SELECT * FROM vehicle_service_history WHERE maintenance_type='Oil Change' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM vehicle_service_history WHERE maintenance_type='Tire Rotation' AND repair_type='Flat Tire'
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM vehicle_service_history WHERE maintenance_type='Oil Change' AND repair_description LIKE '%engine%'
SELECT * FROM vehicle_service_history WHERE repair_type='Battery Replacement' AND maintenance_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY maintenance_date, repair_date
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, repair_type, repair_description FROM vehicle_service_history WHERE maintenance_type='Tire Rotation' OR repair_type='Engine Overhaul'
SELECT * FROM vehicle
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2010
SELECT make, model, year, vin FROM vehicle ORDER BY year DESC
SELECT service_date, service_type, service_description FROM service_history WHERE vehicle_id = 2
SELECT make, model, year, vin FROM vehicle WHERE make LIKE 'Toyota%'
SELECT make, model FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY make ASC, model DESC;
SELECT * FROM service_history WHERE cost > 500.00 AND service_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT DISTINCT make FROM vehicle WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY make ASC;
SELECT vehicle.make, service_history.service_date FROM vehicle JOIN service_history ON vehicle.vehicle_id = service_history.vehicle_id WHERE service_type = 'Tire Rotation' ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT make, model, cost FROM vehicle LEFT JOIN service_history ON vehicle.vehicle_id = service_history.vehicle_id WHERE cost IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT make, model FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT * FROM Maintenance ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Repair WHERE repair_description ILIKE '%brake%';
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model FROM Vehicle WHERE year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY make DESC;
SELECT make, model FROM Vehicle WHERE model LIKE '%SUV%';

SELECT v.make, v.year, m.maintenance_date FROM Vehicle v JOIN Maintenance m ON v.vehicle_id = m.vehicle_id WHERE m.maintenance_description LIKE '%oil change%' ORDER BY v.year ASC, m.maintenance_date DESC;

SELECT r.repair_id, v.make AS vehicle_make, r.repair_date FROM Vehicle v JOIN Repair r ON v.vehicle_id = r.vehicle_id WHERE v.make = 'Toyota' AND r.repair_description LIKE '%brakes%' ORDER BY r.repair_date DESC;
SELECT v.make, v.model, COUNT(m.maintenance_id) AS num_maintenance FROM Vehicle v LEFT JOIN Maintenance m ON v.vehicle_id = m.vehicle_id GROUP BY v.make, v.model HAVING num_maintenance > 3;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicle WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT repair_description, parts_cost FROM Repair ORDER BY repair_date DESC;
SELECT event_type, event_date FROM ServiceHistory WHERE vehicle_id = 2 ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY make DESC, model ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT make, model, year, last_maintenance_date FROM Vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota' OR make = 'Honda';
SELECT v.make, v.model, m.maintenance_type, m.maintenance_date FROM Vehicle v JOIN Maintenance m ON v.vehicle_id = m.vehicle_id WHERE m.cost > 500 ORDER BY v.make ASC, m.maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT repair_id, vehicle_id, repair_date, repair_description, parts_cost FROM Repair WHERE parts_cost BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC, repair_date DESC;
SELECT service_id, event_date, event_type, event_description FROM ServiceHistory WHERE event_type IN ('Accident', 'Oil Change') ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY make DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecord WHERE maintenance_cost > 500 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT repair_description, repair_cost FROM RepairRecord WHERE repair_date < '2022-01-01';

SELECT name AS technician_name, COUNT(assignment_id) AS assignments_count FROM Technician JOIN RepairAssignment ON Technician.technician_id = RepairAssignment.technician_id GROUP BY name HAVING assignments_count > 5 ORDER BY assignments_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle ORDER BY make ASC, model DESC;
SELECT make, year FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecord WHERE maintenance_cost > 500 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT RepairRecord.repair_id, vehicle_id, repair_description, name AS technician_name FROM RepairRecord JOIN Technician ON RepairRecord.repair_id = Technician.technician_id;

SELECT Vehicle.make, MaintenanceRecord.maintenance_type, RepairRecord.repair_cost FROM Vehicle JOIN MaintenanceRecord ON Vehicle.vehicle_id = MaintenanceRecord.vehicle_id JOIN RepairRecord ON Vehicle.vehicle_id = RepairRecord.vehicle_id ORDER BY Vehicle.make ASC, MaintenanceRecord.maintenance_type DESC;
